{master:0}
textfsm_template:
Value ROUTING_INSTANCE (\S+)
Value VLAN_NAME (\S+)
Value TAG (\d+)
Value List INTERFACES (\S+)
		   
Start
  ^Routing\sinstance\s+VLAN\sname\s+Tag\s+Interfaces$$ -> VLAN
		   
VLAN
  ^\S -> Continue.Record
  ^${ROUTING_INSTANCE}\s+${VLAN_NAME}\s+${TAG}\s*$$
  ^\s+${INTERFACES}$$
  ^\s*$$
  ^{master:\d+}
  ^. -> Error
